column4: I get "Some of the packages could not be retrieved from the server(s). Do you want to continue, ignoring these packages?" Should I not continue?
if you continue then it will install packages which are successfully downloaded and continue. but if your select no then it will do nothing, reject all and close.
I realize that. I also realize, if dependencies aren't met, it will break my system.
you can revoer your syste with dpkg
